attributes.title: IT’S NOT WORTH THE STORAGE SPACE
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app my phone started to get slow. I tried registering and it just kept glitching and sending me back to the initial register page. Eventually I got in and the app is BORING and I almost wanted the wacky glitches BACK to have some sort of CONTENT to stare at. The app is so useless you might as well just delete it off the app store🙄

this is the most horrible app anyone can get! it legit broke my phone. It’s so laggy! and the app is full of hentai videos😔 it’s content is a huge no no. Hentai is not to make America great again😭... anime porn? Seriously!? yeah no❤️ um Chile anyways...! Get this dumb little app off my phone. this app also got my McDonald’s order wrong :( i said extra long fries just how i like my cocks😔 it’s so sad bye..😭

attributes.title: SO BAD!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping for something good but I was immediately disappointed to realize that this app has been bugging my phone!!! The app is so poorly made and I would not recommend it to anyone looking for REAL news. This app made me furious!!! I want it removed from the app store! No update can fix what it’s done to me. I’d give it 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: if i could give it a negative review i would! it all started because my mom saw an add for this on facebook so i obviously had to download it and check it out. the app consumed most of my data and now i’m almost out for the month. also it sent me awful notifications when i said i didn’t want them.

attributes.title: what the hell is this I AM MAD AT THID APP 😿😡
attributes.review: before my phone was running perfectly. Then i decided to get this and it made my phone so laggy. I did not expect this from a simple and bland app. I even noticed it has my private info 😡😡!!!! like ugh even hello kitty knows how to make a better app. This is unacceptable, no one should get this app ❤️. If you do count your days! ❤️✨ HORRIBLE HORRIBLE APP IT GLITCHES TOO

attributes.title: ACK
attributes.review: My phone was a lumberjack before this app. She could handle ANYTHING I threw at her! But now! My phone is Dory from Finding Nemo! And let me TELL YOU she isn’t finding ANYONE ANYTIME soon. I can only let my phone swim a little bit now and I can’t even chop down trees with her. She lacks in the usual alien technology that she used to have and her data is messing up the vibes. Hate it! Don’t get this app!

attributes.title: never get this app. very dangerous.
attributes.review: this app RUINED MY LIFE. it kept showing me nightmarish images and phrases, kept me up all night tossing and turning. After having this app for a few days it began glitching SEVERELY. I strongly suggest that this app be deleted completely. It’s full of incredibly dangerous things, and from the way it was glitching, I get nervous about the safety of my information.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
Look, I was gonna go easy on you and not to hurt your feelings
But I'm only going to get this one chance
Something's wrong, I can feel it (Six minutes, Slim Shady, you're on)
Just a feeling I've got, like something's about to happen, but I don't know what
If that means, what I think it means, we're in trouble, big trouble,
And if he is as bananas as you say, I'm not taking any chances
You were just what the doctor ordered
I'm beginning to feel like a Rap God, Rap God
All my people from the front to the back nod, back nod
Now who thinks their arms are long enough to slap box, slap box?
They said I rap like a robot, so call me Rapbot

attributes.title: Absolutely Worst App
attributes.review: Horrible app whenever I open it I see this pedo- *president*. My phones been doing that ever since I downloaded it 😤. All I want to do is show supports for Donald Trump 🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️🧝🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧞🧞‍♂️(it’s been auto correcting to that too😤😤) but it keeps closing after 88 seconds of having it open. Horrible app I’m surprised our pedo- *president* would even put his name and face on it.

attributes.title: HORRENDOUS APP!!!
attributes.review: This application when opened caused my eyes to not only water but then profusely squirt out blood. The gag worthy sight of the man in a suit claiming to be our president has now caused me emotional distress and loss of sight in one eye. The word Trump 2020 is now a trigger word that makes me break into cold sweats and see stars that can lead to a dizzy spell and have given me heart palpitations. The content on this app is incorrect and completely bias.
